long_description: Designed for use with 29er bikes with suspension forks, the SKS Shockblade II 29er front fender helps keep you clean as you clean new lines on the trail. Long, flexible mud guards offer great protection from mud, dirt and trail debris without hindering suspension fork performance. Included mounting kit lets you easily attach the fender to your suspension fork; quick-release bracket enables fast removal of fender when it's not needed.
short_description: Designed for use with 29er bikes with suspension forks, the SKS Shockblade II 29er front fender helps keep you clean as you clean new lines on the trail.
